knimeNode.name: Random Forest Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts patterns according to a majority vote in a random forest model.

fullDescription.intro: Predicts patterns according to a majority vote in a random forest model.
fullDescription.option: Name of the output column containing the prediction.
The confidence of the predicted class. It is the maximum of all confidence values (which can be appended separately).
For each class the prediction confidence. It's the number of trees predicting to the current class (as per column name) divided by the total number of trees.

ports.outPort: Input data along with prediction columns.
